modName: Whiterun Pathway And Market Stall Retexture
summary: A simple modification based on my personal preferences.
descriptionHtml:
Works best with Sexy Whiterun V3 by horrorview.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7059 

NOTE: This will REPLACE your existing textures, so make a back-up of your existing file(s) before installing.

Just a simple re-texture of the stone pathway throughout Whiterun. A little grungier to blend in with the color scheme and the grass border along the paths.

Also did a re-texture of the market stall roofs to be a bit more color coordinated with the surrounding buildings.

12/1/12: OPTIONAL Skyforge/exterior square tile texture replacer added.

I added a grungier version of this tile because I felt the vanilla tile looked too slick and resembled an interior home or bathroom tile.

Again. This is a REPLACER texture, so back up your original file before installing.

Enjoy.
author: voodoohammer

files.name: Whiterun Stone Path and Market Stall Re-Texture
